EmailTemplate.name: 05-09-22 RET Freshop Competitive Attack.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: What Can NCR Freshop Do for Me?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Offering a seamless, digital shopping experience is easier than you think. Let us help take your online grocery shopping to the next level. Introducing NCR Freshop. Enable your business to deliver a differentiated online shopping experience. Built with retailers like you in mind, it: - Delivers personalized web and mobile ordering - Offers an efficient fulfillment process - Provides a seamless pick-up and delivery process - Integrates with existing loyalty and promotions - Easily integrates into current systems See what NCR Freshop can do for you. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Contact us to learn more. <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/contact-us]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> Â© 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
